nodes.name: Configure_Extract_JSON_Fields
nodes.lql: `select get_json_object(\`result\`, '$.has_error') as has_error, get_json_object(\`result\`, '$.error') as error, \`sha256\` as sha256 from CrowdStrike_IOC`

nodes.name: CrowdStrike_IOC
nodes.description: Crowdstrike Falcon Host uniquely combines an array of powerful methods to provide prevention against the rapidly changing tactics, techniques and procedures (TTPs) used by adversaries to breach organizations - including commodity malware, zero-day malware and even advanced malware-free attacks.

descriptor.name: CrowdStrike Falcon Host (OAuth Based)
descriptor.description: Crowdstrike Falcon Host uniquely combines an array of powerful methods to provide prevention against the rapidly changing tactics, techniques and procedures (TTPs) used by adversaries to breach organizations - including commodity malware, zero-day malware and even advanced malware-free attacks.

steps.name: CrowdStrike Falcon Host (OAuth Based) Authentication Information
steps.description: Enter authentication information for the CrowdStrike Falcon Host (OAuth Based) integration

inputs.description: Label for this integration instance.
inputs.label: Label

inputs.description: Define variables here to templatize integration connections and actions. For example, you can use https://www.{{hostname}}.com, where hostname is a variable defined in this input.
inputs.label: Reference Values

inputs.description: Select option to verify connecting server's SSL certificate (Default is Verify SSL Certificate)
inputs.label: Verify SSL

inputs.description: URL to your CrowdStrike Falcon Host (OAuth Based) instance. Eg: https://api.crowdstrike.com
inputs.label: URL

inputs.description: Client ID of your CrowdStrike Falcon Host
inputs.label: Client ID

inputs.description: Client Secret of your CrowdStrike Falcon Host
inputs.label: Client Secret

actions.name: Search Detections
actions.description: Search for detection IDs that match a given query

inputs.description: Search all detection metadata for the provided string. Eg: 'malicious'
inputs.label: Query

inputs.description: Sort detections using these options. (Default is 'Max Severity: Descending')
inputs.label: Sort

inputs.description: Filter detections using a query in Falcon Query Language (FQL) An asterisk wildcard * includes all results. Eg: 'behaviors.behavior_id: {{behavior_id_column}}'
inputs.label: Filter

inputs.description: The first detection to return, where 0 is the latest detection. Use with 'Limit' to manage pagination of results.
inputs.label: Offset

inputs.description: The maximum number of detections to return in this response (default: 9999; max: 9999). Use with 'Offset' to manage pagination of results.
inputs.label: Limit

inputs.description: Time to wait between consecutive API requests in milliseconds. (Default is 0 milliseconds)
inputs.label: Time between consecutive API requests (in millis)

inputs.description: Timeout in seconds (Default is 360 seconds)
inputs.label: Action Timeout

inputs.description: Number of rows to read from parent table
inputs.label: Rows to Process

inputs.description: Count of threads to use for processing rows of input table (Default is 1 thread)
inputs.label: Count of threads

inputs.label: Detection ID

inputs.description: Column name from parent table to lookup value for uid of assignee to modify the detection with. An empty value will ignore the updation of assignee for that detection

inputs.description: Status to modify all the detection with
inputs.label: Status

inputs.description: Jinja-templated comment to add to the detection. Comments are displayed with the detection in Falcon and usually used to provide context or notes for other Falcon users. A detection can have multiple comments over time. Eg: `Changed assignee of Detection: {{dection_id_column}} to {{assignee_uuid_column}} by LogicHub`
inputs.label: Comment

inputs.description: Time to wait between consecutive API requests in milliseconds. (Default is 0 milliseconds)
inputs.label: Time between consecutive API requests (in millis)

inputs.description: Timeout in seconds (Default is 360 seconds)
inputs.label: Action Timeout

inputs.description: Number of rows to read from parent table

inputs.description: Count of threads to use for processing rows of input table (Default is 1 thread)
inputs.label: Count of threads

actions.name: Search Devices
actions.description: Search for devices based on filter.

steps.name: Search Devices
steps.description: Search for devices based on filter

inputs.description:
Jinja2 template for the device filter. Following are few examples. Find more on falcon api documentation. 
1. To find devices with host name 
 hostname: '{{host_column}}'  

 2. To find devices based on prefix or suffix use wildcard ' * ' (supported by few fields) 
 hostname: '{{host_prefix_column}}*' 

3. To find devices with local ip  
 local_ip: '{{ip_column}}' 

4. To find devices which matches both hostname and platform '+' operator is used e.g. 
 hostname: '{{host_column}}' + platform_name:'{{platform_column}}' 

5. To find devices which matches either hostname or platform name ' , ' operator is used e.g. 
 hostname: '{{host_column}}' , platform_name:'{{platform_column}}'
inputs.label: Devices Filter Template

inputs.description: No of results to fetch. (Default is 100 results)
inputs.label: Max Number of Results

inputs.description: Time to wait between consecutive API requests in milliseconds. (Default is 0 milliseconds)
inputs.label: Time between consecutive API requests (in millis)

inputs.description: Timeout in seconds (Default is 360 seconds)
inputs.label: Action Timeout

inputs.description: Number of rows to read from parent table
inputs.label: Rows to Process

inputs.description: Count of threads to use for processing rows of input table (Default is 1 thread)
inputs.label: Count of threads

actions.name: Take Action on Devices
actions.description: Take various actions on the hosts in your environment. Contain or lift containment on hosts. Delete or restore hosts.

inputs.description: Select one of the actions
inputs.label: Action Name

options.label: Contain - This action contains the host, which stops any network communications to locations other than the CrowdStrike cloud and IPs specified in your containment policy
Lift Containment: This action lifts containment on the host, which returns its network communications to normal
Hide Host: This action will delete a host. After the host is deleted, no new detections for that host will be reported via UI or APIs
Unhide Host: This action will restore a host. Detection reporting will resume after the host is restored

inputs.description: The Host Agent ID of device on which an RTR command is to be sent.
inputs.label: Device ID

inputs.description: Time to wait between consecutive API requests in milliseconds. (Default is 0 milliseconds)
inputs.label: Time between consecutive API requests (in millis)

inputs.description: Timeout in seconds (Default is 360 seconds)
inputs.label: Action Timeout

inputs.description: Number of rows to read from parent table
inputs.label: Rows to Process

inputs.description: Count of threads to use for processing rows of input table (Default is 1 thread)
inputs.label: Count of threads

actions.name: Search Incidents
actions.description: Search for incidents by providing an FQL filter, sorting, and paging details

inputs.description: Filter criteria in the form of an FQL query. For more information about FQL queries, see documentation (https://falcon.crowdstrike.com/support/documentation/45/falcon-query-language-fql) in Falcon.
inputs.label: Filter

inputs.description: Enter jinja-templated property to sort on, followed by a dot (.), followed by the sort direction, either "asc" or "desc". Example: `{{property}}.{{direction}}` or `start.desc`
inputs.label: Sort

inputs.description: Max number of incidents to return. (Default is 500). Note: Crowdstrike allows us to fetch only 500 results in single API call, therefore a value greater than 500 will involve multiple API calls and may take some time. Increase Action Timeout, in case action gets timed out.
inputs.label: Limit

inputs.description: Time to wait between consecutive API requests in milliseconds. (Default is 0 milliseconds)
inputs.label: Time between consecutive API requests (in millis)

inputs.description: Timeout in seconds (Default is 360 seconds)
inputs.label: Action Timeout

inputs.description: Number of rows to read from parent table

inputs.label: Action Timeout

inputs.description: Number of rows to read from parent table
inputs.label: Rows to Process

inputs.description: Count of threads to use for processing rows of input table (Default is 1 thread)
inputs.label: Count of threads

actions.name: Falcon X Sandbox Analysis
actions.description: Submit either a URL or a sample SHA256 for sandbox analysis. For SHA256 analysis, a file needs to be uploaded to Falcon X first using action `Falcon X Sandbox File Upload`. This action waits for the analysis to complete for each row of input. Use appropriate number of `Thread Count` to make this action run faster. As per Crowdstrike, time required for each resource to be analyzed varies but is usually less than 15 minutes. Therefore, set `Action Timeout` appropriately.

inputs.description: Select type of analysis you want to run
inputs.label: Type

inputs.description: Column name from parent table that contains URL or SHA256 of file to analyze. Appropriate `Type` above must be selected for the action to perform correctly.
inputs.label: URL/SHA256

inputs.description: The environment relevant to the urls/sha being analyzed
inputs.label: Environment ID

inputs.description: Select type of report you want to get. (Default is `Summarized`)
inputs.label: Report Type

inputs.description: Time to wait between consecutive API requests in milliseconds. (Default is 0 milliseconds)
inputs.label: Time between consecutive API requests (in millis)

inputs.description: Timeout in seconds (Default is 360 seconds)
inputs.label: Action Timeout

inputs.description: Number of rows to read from parent table
inputs.label: Rows to Process

inputs.description: Count of threads to use for processing rows of input table (Default is 1 thread)
inputs.label: Count of threads

failedAttempt.errorMessage: This imported connection is using a different version of the CrowdStrike Falcon Host (OAuth Based) (logichub.crowdstrike_v2) integration than what is currently available on this deployment. Please edit the connection to ensure it works correctly.
